title: Marxism: the theory that split a world
creator_credit: George Kaczender, John Kemeny, Learning Group of America and International Cinemedia Centre
brief_description: A combination of animation, archival material, documentary and fictional recreation is used to portray the history of Karl Marx, and to give the audience an understanding of the influences to his theory of communism.
